original_title: 富士彩色显人生  顯真情
overview: Summer - "Free Carnival" A story of a love affair between men and women. - Winter - "Warm affection" A tale of a couple and grandmother. - Autumn - "A Midnight Nightmare" A story of a nightmare surrounding men and women. - Spring - "Romantic date" A story about the love and friendship involving one man and three women.
tagline: An omnibus drama composed of four thematic short stories.
title: Fuji Colours of Amours
